tool_description: Simple API for providing random stories (hawadeet) from unknown users all over the world
name: Hawadeet
title: Hawadeet

api_list.name: Add Hadoota
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hawadeet.p.rapidapi.com/add-hadoota"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hawadeet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hawadeet.p.rapidapi.com/add-hadoota"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hawadeet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
